org.bremersee.utils

Class TagUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bremersee.utils.TagUtils

  • public abstract class TagUtils
extends Object

    Some methods to work with a tags.

    Author:
    Christian Bremer

    • Method Detail

      • buildTags

        public static String[] buildTags(String freeText)
        Build tags from a string. Each tag must have a minimum length of 2.
        Parameters:
        freeText - the text
        Returns:
        the tags

      • buildTags

        public static String[] buildTags(String freeText,
                                 int minLengthOfSingleTag)
        Build tags from a text. Each tag must have a minimum length of the specified value. If a token should contain space characters (e. g. 'free wifi'), replace the spaces with a plus character (e. g. 'free+wifi').
        Parameters:
        freeText - the text
        minLengthOfSingleTag - the minimum length
        Returns:
        the tags

      • buildTags

        public static String[] buildTags(String freeText,
                                 int minLengthOfSingleTag,
                                 CaseFormat caseFormat)
        Build tags from a text. Each tag must have a minimum length of the specified value. If a token should contain space characters (e. g. 'free wifi'), replace the spaces with a plus character (e. g. 'free+wifi').
        Parameters:
        freeText - the text
        minLengthOfSingleTag - the minimum length
        caseFormat - should the tags be lower case, upper case or untouched?
        Returns:
        the tags

      • buildTagString

        public static String buildTagString(String[] tags)
        Build a string from the tags. The string has a maximum length of 255.
        Parameters:
        tags - the tags
        Returns:
        the string

      • buildTagString

        public static String buildTagString(String[] tags,
                                    int maxLengthOfTagString)
        Build a string from the tags. The string has a maximum length of the specified value.
        Parameters:
        tags - the tags
        maxLengthOfTagString - the maximum length
        Returns:
        the string

      • buildTagString

        public static String buildTagString(String freeText)
        Build a string with text: First buildTags(String, int) is called with a minimum length of 2 than buildTagString(String[], int) with a maximum length of 255.
        Parameters:
        freeText - a string with tags
        Returns:
        the parsed tags

      • buildTagString

        public static String buildTagString(String freeText,
                                    int minLengthOfSingleTag)
        Build a string with text: First buildTags(String, int) than buildTagString(String[], int) with a maximum length of 255.
        Parameters:
        freeText - a string with tags
        minLengthOfSingleTag - the minimum length of one tag
        Returns:
        the parsed tags

      • buildTagString

        public static String buildTagString(String freeText,
                                    int minLengthOfSingleTag,
                                    CaseFormat caseFormat)
        Build a string with text: First buildTags(String, int) than buildTagString(String[], int) with a maximum length of 255.
        Parameters:
        freeText - a string with tags
        minLengthOfSingleTag - the minimum length of one tag
        caseFormat - should the tags be lower case, upper case or untouched?
        Returns:
        the parsed tags

      • buildTagString

        public static String buildTagString(String freeText,
                                    int minLengthOfSingleTag,
                                    int maxLengthOfTagString)
        Build a string with text: First buildTags(String, int) is called than buildTagString(String[], int).
        Parameters:
        freeText - a string with tags
        minLengthOfSingleTag - the minimum length of one tag
        maxLengthOfTagString - the maximum length of the parsed tags
        Returns:
        the parsed tags

      • buildTagString

        public static String buildTagString(String freeText,
                                    int minLengthOfSingleTag,
                                    int maxLengthOfTagString,
                                    CaseFormat caseFormat)
        Build a string with text: First buildTags(String, int) is called than buildTagString(String[], int).
        Parameters:
        freeText - a string with tags
        minLengthOfSingleTag - the minimum length of one tag
        maxLengthOfTagString - the maximum length of the parsed tags
        caseFormat - should the tags be lower case, upper case or untouched?
        Returns:
        the parsed tags
